text: Samuel Molina Vivar (born 29 November 1998) is a Spanish professional boxer who has held the IBO IberoAmerican lightweight title since 2019.https://boxrec.com/en/proboxer/805962 BoxRec ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !
